In England, in the seven days to 30 April, there were 12,733 new confirmed cases (22.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 April, there were 13,991 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 9% (1,258 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 May is 3,866,919 (6,870 cases per 100,000 population).
